name: 3d Fox
description: This is a 3d fox written in three.js.

name: Bouncing Balls
description: This project was written in p5.js. It is a simple bouncing ball game.

name: Tic Tac Toe
description: This is a Tic Tac Toe game written in React.js. It features an unbeatable AI.

name: Alien Fractions
description: These are alien fractions. They are insanely cool, but if you stare at them too long the aliens will beam into your eyeballs.

name: Rain
description: Blue rain in p5.js. The colours of each drop is slightly different. We fix the red and blue components and vary the green component.

name: Binary Counter
description: This is a binary counter written in JavaScript. It contains toggles that make a binary number. The binary number is then converted into decimal.

name: The Matrix Effect
description: The Matrix Effect in p5.js. Letters will rain down your monitor making a wonderfull effect.

name: Typewriter
description: Javascript Typewriter. You can type in the text box and a text will be displayed as if you were using a typewriter.
